# duration

**Instance Property**

Specifies the basic duration of the animation, in seconds.

## Declaration

```swift
var duration: CFTimeInterval { get set }
```

## Discussion

Defaults to 0.

## Duration and Speed

- **speed**: Specifies how time is mapped to receiver’s time space from the parent time space.
